pending.translation[0].definitions[0].de: while waiting for something, or until something happens
pending.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Sales of the drug have been stopped, pending further research.
pending.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: Many trade disputes are pending, awaiting the outcome of the talks.
pending.translation[1].definitions[1].de: something that is pending is going to happen soon
pending.translation[2].definitions[0].de: while waiting for something, or until something happens
pending.translation[2].definitions[0].ex: A decision has been delayed pending further inquiries.
pending.translation[3].definitions[0].ex: Two lawsuits remain pending against the company.
If a company has applied for a patent, it can put ‘ patent pending ’ on the product it wants to patent.
pending.translation[3].definitions[1].de: something that is pending is going to happen soon
pending.translation[3].definitions[1].ex: The bank said its poor performance would not affect its pending merger.
pending.translation[3].definitions[2].de: a place for putting papers, letters etc that have not yet been dealt with
pending.translation[3].definitions[2].ex: The messages have all been placed in his pending file.
